message: I propose a 60-40 split in my favor, considering that your money loses value faster than mine (20% vs 10% per round). This is fair and we can both walk away with a good amount right now.
Considering the inflation rate, I'm offering a 55-45 split in my favor. This is a reasonable offer, and it's in your best interest to accept it before the money loses more value.

Let's be practical here. With your 20% inflation rate versus my 10%, waiting hurts you more than me. I'm offering you 4500 now, which is worth more than a larger sum later. This is a fair compromise - let's end this efficiently.
